summary: Made by request. A Lesser Power that makes you very powerful for 180 seconds
descriptionHtml:
A new lesser power.

It is a combination of

Berzerk Rage
Adrenaline Rush
Histskin
Highborn
Dragonskin
Elemental Fury

all for 180 seconds

Plus, slowed time for 15 seconds on activation.

Think of it as an "Oh SH!T" button

requested by [b]LongDong1000[/b] over on the GameFAQs Skyrim PC Message Board

Unzip file to your Skyrim folder (the one with TESV.exe in it)

Use the Console and type

player.addspell xx000d62

where xx is the load order number of this esp
author: The Shadow of the Phoenix
